meanings.definition: A hairstyle created by treating the hair with chemicals to produce waves or curls.
meanings.sent1: She got lovely perms for her prom night.
meanings.sent2: Many people in the 80s had perms to add volume to their hair.
meanings.sent3: The poodle's fluffy perms made it the star of the dog show.
meanings.sent4: Her perms were like a gentle ocean breeze, flowing and beautiful.
meanings.sent5: The perms in the magazine looked so stylish and trendy.

meanings.definition: To give a permanent wave to (hair).
meanings.sent1: The hairstylist perms her clients' hair with precision.
meanings.sent2: She perms her hair every few months to maintain the curls.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally perms his sister's hair while trying a new technique.
meanings.sent4: The salon promised to perms her hair into a glamorous style.
meanings.sent5: Perming her hair transformed her look completely.
